summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 30th Avenue South, from College Street to McClellan Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances all in accordance with Resolution No. 8297 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
